languages.text: {n}Джай с интересом подается вперед.{/n} "Тощее тело и высокий рост присущи и пустотнорожденным, о губернатор. Что не делает их мутантами. Что же такого смущает ваш взор в этой... Ирлиэт?"

{n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай с интересом подается вперед.{/n} "Тощее тело и высокий рост присущи и пустотнорожденным, о губернатор. Что не делает их мутантами. Что же такого смущает ваш взор в этой... Ирлиэт?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

{n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

{n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

{n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

{n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

languages.text: {n}ジェイは興味津々に前に身を乗り出した。{/n}「痩せた体格と背の高さは、虚空生まれには一般的な特徴ね、あたしの親愛なる総督様。だからと言って、それが彼女らを変異体にするわけではないでしょ。じゃあ、教えて、何がアンタにとってこの…ユリエットの容姿がそんなに不快なの？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは興味津々に前に身を乗り出した。{/n}「痩せた体格と背の高さは、虚空生まれには一般的な特徴ね、あたしの親愛なる総督様。だからと言って、それが彼女らを変異体にするわけではないでしょ。じゃあ、教えて、何がアンタにとってこの…ユリエットの容姿がそんなに不快なの？」

languages.text: {n}Jae se penche en avant, curieuse.{/n} « Même les hors-monde présentent souvent un corps longiligne, ma chère gouverneure. Ça ne fait pas d'eux des mutants pour autant. Je vous en prie, pourriez-vous me dire ce que cette... Yrliet a de si désagréable à vos yeux ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se penche en avant, curieuse.{/n} « Même les hors-monde présentent souvent un corps longiligne, ma chère gouverneure. Ça ne fait pas d'eux des mutants pour autant. Je vous en prie, pourriez-vous me dire ce que cette... Yrliet a de si désagréable à vos yeux ? »

languages.text: {n}婕伊好奇地往前靠了靠。{/n}“亲爱的总督，虚空之子确实拥有高挑的身材和异于常人的外表，但拥有这种特征的人，可未必都是变种人。不知这个伊莉耶特的外表……有什么异于常人之处？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊好奇地往前靠了靠。{/n}“亲爱的总督，虚空之子确实拥有高挑的身材和异于常人的外表，但拥有这种特征的人，可未必都是变种人。不知这个伊莉耶特的外表……有什么异于常人之处？”

languages.text: {n}Jae se inclina hacia delante con curiosidad.{/n} «No es raro ver a un nacido en el vacío de complexión fuerte y estatura prominente, mi querida gobernadora. Y no por ello es un mutante. ¿Sería tan amable de decir qué le repugna de esta tal... Yrliet?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se inclina hacia delante con curiosidad.{/n} «No es raro ver a un nacido en el vacío de complexión fuerte y estatura prominente, mi querida gobernadora. Y no por ello es un mutante. ¿Sería tan amable de decir qué le repugna de esta tal... Yrliet?».

languages.text: {n}Jae beugt sich neugierig vor.{/n} "Eine hagere, großgewachsene Statur ist auch unter Kindern der Leere nichts Ungewöhnliches, meine liebe Gouverneurin. Das macht sie nicht zu Mutanten. Und was genau stößt Euch dann derart ab? Yrliets Aussehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae beugt sich neugierig vor.{/n} "Eine hagere, großgewachsene Statur ist auch unter Kindern der Leere nichts Ungewöhnliches, meine liebe Gouverneurin. Das macht sie nicht zu Mutanten. Und was genau stößt Euch dann derart ab? Yrliets Aussehen?"

languages.text: {n}Jae, merakla öne eğiliyor.{/n} "Cılız beden ile uzun boy, uçsuzdoğanlar arasında dahi yaygın fiziksel özelliklerdir sevgili vali. Bu, onların mutant olduğu anlamına gelmez. Söylesenize, bu... Yrliet'in görünüşünde sizi bu kadar rahatsız eden nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae leans forward curiously.{/n} "Gauntness of frame and tall stature are features common even among voidborn, my dear governor. That does not make them mutants. Then, pray, whatever do you find so disagreeable about this... Yrliet's appearance?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, merakla öne eğiliyor.{/n} "Cılız beden ile uzun boy, uçsuzdoğanlar arasında dahi yaygın fiziksel özelliklerdir sevgili vali. Bu, onların mutant olduğu anlamına gelmez. Söylesenize, Yrliet'in görünüşünde sizi bu kadar rahatsız eden nedir?"
